rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人工智能在科学和发现中的作用日益增强随着 ChatGPT4 的出现，人工智能在医学中的应用吸引了公众的注意力，占据了新闻头条，并引发了关于医疗人工智能的前景和危险的激烈辩论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/The-having-role-of-AI-in-science-and-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/The-having-role-of-AI-in-science-and-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9eb9dea5-9a5e-49cd-9b1b-c256d245390f Mon, 21 Aug 2023 20:58:22 -0400 The growing role of AI in science and discovery
加强监狱重返计划有助于减少美国阿片类药物过量死亡随着美国阿片类药物过量死亡人数激增，许多社区迫切需要解决方案来减少死亡人数。罗格斯大学领导的一项研究发现，其中最有希望的是加强针对高风险使用者的监狱重返计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Strengthening-prison-reentry-programs-can-help-reduce-opioid-overdose-deaths-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Strengthening-prison-reentry-programs-can-help-reduce-opioid-overdose-deaths-in-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2dac17b1-5583-47da-808a-99fccdc58396 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 20:53:59 -0400 Strengthening prison reentry programs can help reduce opioid overdose deaths in the U.S.
NIH 支持研究了解非酒精性脂肪肝疾病中基因组-金属相互作用刘万庆博士是韦恩州立大学尤金·阿普尔鲍姆药学与健康科学学院药学教授和韦恩州立大学医学院药理学教授，获得美国国家环境研究所颁发的 300 万美元的五年期奖金美国国立卫生研究院健康科学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/NIH-supports-research-to-understand-the-genome-metal-interactions-in-nonanol-fatty-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/NIH-supports-research-to-understand-the-genome-metal-interactions-in-nonanol-fatty-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01f6f3c0-e2a5-43bb-9a8b-28d7c0bd9cc6 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 20:47:55 -0400 NIH supports research to understand the genome-metal interactions in nonalcoholic fatty liver disease
对不平等的结构性解释可以减少对儿童的偏见一组心理学研究人员的一项新研究发现，儿童对不平等的看法可能会受到向他们解释其原因的方式的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Structural-explanations-for-inequality-can-reduce-bias-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Structural-explanations-for-inequality-can-reduce-bias-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=257574b3-a5af-42f7-8671-a5de384f052e Mon, 21 Aug 2023 20:28:56 -0400 Structural explanations for inequality can reduce bias in children
研究发现癌症患者可能需要更频繁地注射 COVID-19 加强针对于许多人来说，COVID-19 大流行的威胁似乎已经结束。然而，对于免疫系统因癌症或癌症治疗而受损的患者来说，对 COVID-19 感染和严重疾病的恐惧仍然非常真实。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Cancer-病人-may-need-more-frequent-COVID-19-booster-shots-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Cancer-病人-may-need-more-frequent-COVID-19-booster-shots-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1490021-d742-4f4c-a411-a82ffc5152a6 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 20:22:53 -0400 Cancer patients may need more frequent COVID-19 booster shots, study finds
人工智能驱动的眼部扫描可能会彻底改变帕金森氏症的早期检测伦敦大学学院和莫菲尔德眼科医院的研究小组已经确定了平均在临床表现前七年就表明患者存在帕金森病的标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/AI-powered-eye-scans-could-revolutionize-early-detection-of-Parkinsons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/AI-powered-eye-scans-could-revolutionize-early-detection-of-Parkinsons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb278a54-e1dd-4554-b92c-cf1e6828c718 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 20:18:07 -0400 AI-powered eye scans could revolutionize early detection of Parkinson's
腔内乳腺癌的非传统基因融合：治疗的新靶点2023 年 6 月 12 日，Oncotarget 第 14 卷发表了一篇新的社论论文，题为“顺式剪接融合蛋白在更具侵袭性的管腔乳腺癌中是否具有病理性？” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Non-traditional-gene-fusions-in-luminal-breast-cancer-A-new-target-for-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Non-traditional-gene-fusions-in-luminal-breast-cancer-A-new-target-for-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cffe1dff-47ff-4b23-bccc-a11354281808 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 20:11:04 -0400 Non-traditional gene fusions in luminal breast cancer: A new target for therapy
低收入和中等收入国家的 COVID-19 疫苗接种应补充常规儿童疫苗根据一项审查，COVID-19 疫苗可有效对抗儿童和青少年的严重疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/COVID-19-vaccination-in-low-and-middle-venue-countries-should-complement-routine-childhood-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/COVID-19-vaccination-in-low-and-middle-venue-countries-should-complement-routine-childhood-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ff6dc75-60e9-49ce-afef-291d5b04348a Mon, 21 Aug 2023 20:03:20 -0400 COVID-19 vaccination in low- and middle-income countries should complement routine childhood vaccines
简单的血液测试可以预测糖尿病肾病患者罹患进展性心脏病和肾病的风险根据今天发表在美国心脏协会旗舰期刊《Circulation》上的新研究，一项简单的血液测试可以预测 2 型糖尿病和肾脏疾病患者罹患进行性心脏和肾脏疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Simple-blood-test-may-predict-risk-of-progressive-heart-and-kidney-disease-in-people-with-diabetic-kidney-疾病.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Simple-blood-test-may-predict-risk-of-progressive-heart-and-kidney-disease-in-people-with-diabetic-kidney-疾病.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9d0784e-8b0c-456a-8caa-2b2487e1f3a6 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 19:53:55 -0400 Simple blood test may predict risk of progressive heart and kidney disease in people with diabetic kidney disease
限时喂养可以纠正阿尔茨海默氏病的昼夜节律紊乱阿尔茨海默病的标志之一是人体昼夜节律的破坏，这是调节我们许多生理过程的内部生物钟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Time-restricted-feeding-may- Correct-the-circadian-disruptions-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Time-restricted-feeding-may- Correct-the-circadian-disruptions-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b23bfb3e-74fd-4611-95cf-d23bf60e4a19 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 19:45:51 -0400 Time-restricted feeding may correct the circadian disruptions in Alzheimer's disease
